title: Brooklin Becker
text:
Student of the iSchool’s Bachelor of Information at the University of Toronto, with a background in Criminology & Sociolegal Studies. Expert communicator. Masterful collaborator. Thrives in environments which demand adaptability and agility, and value cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about criminal justice policy, everything data and anything innovative.

Professional Experience
University of Toronto Innovation Hub | Toronto, ON | UX/UI Designer | April 2024 - Current
University of Toronto Student Engagement | Toronto, ON | Campus Organizations Assistant | Sept. 2023 - Current
University of Toronto Student Engagement | Toronto, ON | Special Projects Assistant | Sept. 2022 - April 2023
